response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,000,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We are offering the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a valuable asset at a price that is still significantly higher than its market value for us, while ensuring you get the best deal possible. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
